text: Aarott ir'Wynarn was the fourth ruler of [[Aundair]], coming of age in [[941 YK|Khorvaire calendar]]. He was preceded by Regent Marlex, who continued to serve in an advisory role after Aarott took the throne. Aarott was obsessed with exploiting [[Aundair]]'s [[arcane|arcane magic]] edge on the battlefields of the [[Last War]], and began a secret weapons project at [[Arcanix]] known as //Seven Stones// (see the [[Ninth Wands]] for more information).
title: Aarott ir'Wynarn
